name: iliO
description:
iliO is a amazing puzzle game !

You target is to complete all the levels in puzzle mode, destroying the same geometric shapes.

ENJOY SHOOTING GAME MECHANICS

How to play iliO

1. Touch the figure at the bottom of the screen to shoot.

2. Your figures must be of the same shape for a successful destruction.

3. Destroy all figures to unlock the next level.

Highlighted Features of iliO

1. When you need relaxation, diversion or just a moment of distraction enjoy this game.

2. Stunning effects and HD graphics.

3. Easy to learn but difficult to master the game.

5. Keep on challenging levels to improve shooting skills;

4. Offline game.

5. 18 levels.

Enjoy best shooting experience in this Puzzle games！

Any suggestion is welcome!
